ISSUE.TITLE: Contribution: Add open graph property "og:image:url" to display correct image when sharing on Facebook
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Problem: When sharing a product on facebook, the product image is not shown as expected. Instead the logotype is shown. Using nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to fix the problem: Add meta property **og:image:url** with the same value as **og:image** in ProductTemplate.Simple.cshtml and ProductTemplate.Grouped.cshtml to resolve. This possibly applies to any other place where only og:image is used such as Blog.
